@swyx I like lightning talks too. (That’s why we’ll have 8 over the 2 days!) But for a conference where people pay for travel, hotel, tickets, I think it’s important to go a bit deeper than 10 mins allow. Our 30 min slots are way more concise than the 50 mins I was once used to.
